DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this observational epidemiological study is to investigate the management and the complications associated with Non Traumatic Neuro-Vascular Diseases. Data will be analysed to answer pre-defined scientific projects and to improve management of these conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Non Traumatic Neuro-Vascular Diseases Critical Complications : a Prospective Cohort Study
DOC.detailed_description: Anonymous data will be collected by study coordinators in a secured e-database. Cross audit will be performed to check data.
DOC.criteria: Non Traumatic NeuroVascular Diseases Consent withdrawal
